alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Routt and east central Moffat Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 449 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Hayden, or 12 miles northeast of Craig, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Routt and east central Moffat Counties. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 40 in Colorado between mile markers 96 and 98. Colorado 13 between mile markers 95 and 102. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Elkhead and Park Mountains
